title: A Mid-level (Middle-aged) Office Worker’s Laid-Back Industrial Revolution in Another World - Novel Updates
tags: Demi-Humans   Dense Protagonist   Domestic Affairs   Fantasy World   Male Protagonist   Modern Knowledge   Transported to Another World
author: Zero Take   ゼロ竹
description:
When Takeo (35) came to, he was in a world of magic and demons in a medieval setting. Without understanding anything, meet people, talk to people, and improve lives. Getting engaged to the granddaughter of the person who took him in, spreading the culture and knowledge of food, making important acquaintances, searching for friends, and living life almost like a big-shot.

A middle-aged man spends his days in a carefree way in another world.>
